cs.DS, cs.CC, cs.LG, cs.OC, cs.NA. 

The paper deals with the design of algorithms for solving linear programs, which is a fundamental problem in computer science and optimization. The focus is on packing and covering LPs, which are important classes of LPs with applications in various fields. The paper proposes new algorithms for solving these LPs in nearly linear time, which is a significant result in the field of optimization. The paper uses techniques from convex optimization and linear algebra, which are common in the areas of machine learning, data science, and operations research. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper are cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms), cs.CC (Computational Complexity), cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.OC (Optimization and Control), and cs.NA (Numerical Analysis).
